about_the_game:
Tank on Tank Digital East Front brings World War II tactical ground combat to your computer screen! Command tanks across the Eastern Front with supporting infantry, artillery, and air support. Based on the popular Peter Bogdasarian design, this cutting-edge digital version presents a low complexity, easy-to-learn game that will provide hours of fun, or a quick scratch of your wargaming itch.


Module East Front with 19 Scenarios and 3 Campaigns (Stalingrad consists of 5 Scenarios 18 Turns each on an evolving unique Stalingrad Map):

Slow Response
Pak Front
Betrayal
Closing In
Dash for the Dvina
Smashing Through
Relief Convoy
Roll Back
City Fight
Heavy Clash
Red Storm
Panther Pride
Clear the Road
Counter Attack
The First Bid
Day 2
Day 3
Day 4
Day 5
Operation East – Campaign
Donets Campaign 1943 – Campaign
Stalingrad – Campaign

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8+
  • Processor: MacBook, MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, Mac Mini, iMac or Mac Pro on after 2010
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Internal
